about_the_game:
“ If You Win … You Loose ! "

i-presentation Of the Game :

This game is a metroid like 2d ,

a pure platform adventure game, and a die and retry galore :

Unlike most other platform games which are more of the action platform genre or not difficult enough , in this game you control so vulnerable character without any power or protection abilities, or a scratch of an obstacle or trap or enemy means immediate failure.

In fact the game tells the story of a stranger involved in spite of himself in a great dilemma and a great planetary danger , and to make matters worse , he is constantly in a race against time and short of means to solve in time the riddle of this adventure.

If you accept the challenge, would you be able to win the game, really ?

Have fun and especially no flying controllers please ...

ii-game Characteristics :


  • Metroid Like 2d.

  • Pure Adventure Platform Game.

  • die and Retry.

  • 5 Parts and 4 Powers.

  • Quite Difficult Game.

  • several Choices to Make,

  • and A Challenge to Meet.

    Important : The current version, does not reflect the game in final state

    Copyright 2021
detailed_description:
Game available now

Good Morning everybody,

just to inform you that the game will be available in max 10 minutes.

After this i hope good day and good game to all.

See you soon.

Cordially.

Mohammad Trigi.

name: If you win...you lose !

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 or Windows 10 64 bits
  • Processor: Intel i5 generation 5 or equivalents or sup
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: intel 4000 hd gpu, or équivalents or sup
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 or Windows 10 64 bits
  • Processor: Intel i7 4510U or equivalents or sup
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Ge force 850m or equivalents or sup
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: preferably ssd

short_description: A quite difficult and quite original platform adventure game, die and retry.
